## isTableOf() function

Returns true if the value is a table (i.e. a 2D array) of one or more given types.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isTableOf(types: TypeOf[], value: unknown): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  types | TypeOf\[\] | Expected type of each item. |
|  value | unknown | The value to verify. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if each item in the array is of the given type, false otherwise.
